history.proof: induction 1 using binary_le_ind. - left. auto. - destruct (rem_2_is_0_or_1 n) as [Hrem_n | Hrem_n]. + right. split. * qsimpl time: 1 use: in_ble_0. * rewrite Hrem_n. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_ble_0,rem_2_lt. + destruct (rem_2_is_0_or_1 m) as [Hrem_m | Hrem_m]. * right. split. -- qsimpl time: 1 use: in_ble_0,rem_2_lt. -- rewrite Hrem_m. scongruence depth: 3. * right. split. -- sfirstorder depth: 3. -- lia.

exceptions.exn: In environment n, m : nat H : rem n 2 <= rem m 2 H0 : div n 2 ≲ div m 2 IHbinary_le : div n 2 = 0 \\/ div (div n 2) 2 ≲ div (div m 2) 2 /\\ rem (div n 2) 2 <= rem (div m 2) 2 Hrem_n : rem n 2 = 0 Unable to unify "0 ≲ ?M1508" with "div n 2 ≲ div m 2".

In environment n, m : nat H : rem n 2 <= rem m 2 H0 : div n 2 ≲ div m 2 IHbinary_le : div n 2 = 0 \\/ div (div n 2) 2 ≲ div (div m 2) 2 /\\ rem (div n 2) 2 <= rem (div m 2) 2 Hrem_n : rem n 2 = 0 Unable to unify "S (rem ?M1525 2) <= 2" with "0 <= rem m 2".

original: induction 1 using binary_le_ind. - left. auto. - destruct (rem_2_is_0_or_1 n) as [Hrem_n | Hrem_n]. + right. split. * apply in_ble_0. * rewrite Hrem_n. apply rem_2_lt. + destruct (rem_2_is_0_or_1 m) as [Hrem_m | Hrem_m]. * right. split. -- apply in_ble_0. -- rewrite Hrem_m. auto. * right. split. -- apply in_ble_1; auto. -- lia.
